name: Shadow Of The Colossus: Limited Edition
summary:
Shadow of the Colossus is a majestic journey through ancient lands to seek out and destroy gigantic mythical beasts. With a trusty horse at your side, players explore the spacious lands and unearth each towering Colossus creature. The uneasy task of defeating a Colossus relies on intelligent puzzle solving and action oriented game play. 
Armed with strong wits, a mystical sword and a sturdy bow, players use cunning and strategy to topple each behemoth.
